# relativeCurve(to:controlPoint:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ AppKit ](/documentation/appkit)

- [ NSBezierPath ](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath)

- [ relativeCurve(to:controlPoint:) ](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/relativecurve(to:controlpoint:))

- [ NSBezierPath ](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath)

-  relativeCurve(to:controlPoint:) 

Instance Method# relativeCurve(to:controlPoint:)

macOS 14.0+

```
func relativeCurve(
    to endPoint: NSPoint,
    controlPoint: NSPoint
)
```

## [See Also](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/relativecurve(to:controlpoint:)#see-also)

### [Constructing a Path](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/relativecurve(to:controlpoint:)#Constructing-a-Path)

[`func move(to: NSPoint)`](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/move(to:))Moves the path’s current point to the specified location.[`func line(to: NSPoint)`](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/line(to:))Appends a straight line to the path.[`func curve(to: NSPoint, controlPoint1: NSPoint, controlPoint2: NSPoint)`](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/curve(to:controlpoint1:controlpoint2:))Adds a Bezier cubic curve to the path.[`func curve(to: NSPoint, controlPoint: NSPoint)`](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/curve(to:controlpoint:))[`func close()`](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/close())Closes the most recently added subpath.[`func relativeMove(to: NSPoint)`](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/relativemove(to:))Moves the path’s current point to a new point whose location is the specified distance from the current point.[`func relativeLine(to: NSPoint)`](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/relativeline(to:))Appends a straight line segment to the path starting at the current point and moving towards the specified point, relative to the current location.[`func relativeCurve(to: NSPoint, controlPoint1: NSPoint, controlPoint2: NSPoint)`](/documentation/appkit/nsbezierpath/relativecurve(to:controlpoint1:controlpoint2:))Adds a Bezier cubic curve to the path from the current point to a new location, which is specified as a relative distance from the current point.
